title: judicial review
extract: Judicial review is a process under which executive or legislative actions are subject to review by the judiciary. ... Judicial review is one of the checks and balances in the separation of powers: the power of the judiciary to supervise the legislative and executive branches when the latter exceed their authority.
extract_html: Judicial review is a process under which executive or legislative actions are subject to review by the judiciary. ... Judicial review is one of the checks and balances in the separation of powers: the power of the judiciary to supervise the legislative and executive branches when the latter exceed their authority.
